PersonalStatement.text: Jacob Chapman, born on 1985-01-21, is a Male based in Jasonchester, Georgia. He is Single and holds Japanese nationality. Currently working at Davis Inc.

WorkExperience.text: Software Developer at Stokes PLC from 2006 to 2018.
Senior Project Manager at Davis Inc, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from Sophia University
Master's in Engineering from Universidad de Guanajuato

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys woodworking.
